chapters.title: Chapter 9: Decisions
chapters.info: Asmodean, p. 183 (157)—One of the Forsaken. He was a musician before he turned to the Shadow; he did so in order to obtain revenge on those who were more successful musicians than he. Lanfear says that he would be able to teach Rand how to control saidin and that he would not be as anxious to kill him as the other Forsaken would be. See also Joar Addam Nesossin; Natael, Jasin.
